excerpt: "The Port Authority of New York and New Jersey gave the first public test of its new self-driving shuttle. The retrofitted van has sensors, robotic steering and cameras to help it detect obstacles. The plan is to use it for shorter rides around the airport, such as between the new Terminal A and the nearest parking facility."
